name: Secrets Capri Riviera Cancun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at Secrets Capri. The food was excellent, much better than what I expected for an all-inclusive, especially the seafood restaurant (Oceana).
reviews.title: Great romantic getaway

reviews.text: I woul like to address some of the negative comments I had read in previous reviews. The smell - yes, there is a burning smell early in the morning outside, but by the time we were ready to lay by the pool or beach it was gone. The beds are a little hard but we got used to it after the first night or two.
reviews.title: Family Wedding at Secrets Capri

reviews.text: The beach is not the greatest but ok. Due to erosion, beaches in the area can change overnight. The pool is very close to the beach so you can lay by the pool and almost be on the beach. It is a great beach for walking, you can walk quite a long way past neighboring resorts.
reviews.title: Secrets was Okay ... but

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The spa was good, not great, not much privacy in the changing room and we could hear a lot of noise during our massage, The massage was excellent.
reviews.title: Most Complete Review EVER

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we had a wonderful time, and the staff was very helpful and pleaseant, especially the poolside service.
reviews.title: Can't wait to go back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I didn't know about this hotel until my travel agent recommended it. So I did some research online and found out many people enjoyed this place. I agree with them whole heartedly. Every staff was extremely friendly and helpful. My husband is an active person. So lying by the pool isn’t exactly his cup of tea. But they have tons of fun activities to do like pool volleyball or ping-pong tournament. He would participate in those while I would just sip my cocktail and get a nice tan. It’s relatively small intimate hotel but they certainly consider everything. The other thing that wasn’t as perfect would be their food. They have good varieties to choose from but the quality could improve. It still tastes good. But compared to all other amenities, it needs to raise the bar a bit. All in all, it was the BEST vacation that we ever had.
reviews.title: Amazing honeymoon, Best vacation ever!!

reviews.text: We were so disappointed in this place! I will address each issue separately:
reviews.title: Very Disappointing
Beautiful resort!
reviews.text: The rooms are very nice and spacious. The bathroom is large and the shower is nice. However, the walls are paper thin and the property was not built well. There is a lot of noise! Furthermore, the power went out multiple times (once in the middle of the night) followed by a loud beeping noise outside of our room for several hours. Eventually - I stopped trying to set the clock in our room because every time I came back, the power had gone out and it was flashing. It rained very hard two of the nights and we spoke to another couple who awoke to water dripping from the ceiling. Despite these annoyances - the room and is definitely the highlight of the property.

reviews.title: great rooms/horrible service and drinks
reviews.text: The pool is nice. They provide rafts and it isn't a problem to get one. The service at the pool is terrible. If you want an umbrella or need something -don't expect it to happen quickly. They are terribly under-staffed. We had one nice waiter at the pool who was happy and energetic! The rest of the staff seemed grumpy and the service was slow.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was such a disappointment at this resort. I am shocked that people refer to the restaurants as " 5 star." The portions are incredibly small and have no flavor. Someone told us that the Italian restaurant was the best. None of us were satisfied and we all left hungry.
reviews.title: Amazing Holiday at Secrets Capri!

reviews.text: Stayed here 2-9 to 2-16-08. Was great. Room was wonderful, the hot shower was the bomb, great pillows, nice view of beach.

reviews.title: Fantastic Resort
Not First Class !!! Just nice !
reviews.text: After an elaborate wedding, we wanted an all-inclusive, adults only, relaxing honeymoon. Secrets fit the bill in every way. The staff was absolutely wonderful. From the minute we arrived on the grounds, until we were seen off on the last day, we were completely pampered.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked our honeymoon through expedia.com. Not a single complaint there. Everything was very well organized, easy enough to get all itinerary and invoices printed off for our trip. We opted for the transfer service from the airport through Expedia... DEFINITELY recommend that. It's through Best Day Tours. Once you get off the plane, you head right outside (don't worry about the timeshare people, they didn't bother us one bit)... and the bus is waiting to bring you to the resort. Everyone from Best Day was very nice.
reviews.title: Loved Secrets Capri!

likes.liked: — The service, food and drinks, and cleanliness

description: Secrets Capri Riviera Cancun, a proud unlimited luxury resort has received special recognition from the esteemed readers of Condé Nast Traveler Magazine in Mexico and AAA as a Four Diamond Award resort. Secrets Capri Riviera Cancun was awarded the Best for Romance and Best Luxury-World by the 2008 TripAdvisor Travelers' Choice Awards. Only TripAdvisor's hotel awards represent the opinions of millions of travelers. The winners were determined by a combination of the highest traveler ratings and the TripAdvisor Popularity Index, a measurement of overall traveler satisfaction. Situated five minutes from exciting Playa del Carmen and a short 35-minute drive south of Cancun International Airport, the world's second largest barrier reef lies just offshore, while underground rivers, caves and jungles lure adventure-lovers. Bordered by sugar-white beaches and the brilliant, crystal clear Caribbean Sea, this Preferred Club, Unlimited-Luxury, adults-only oasis truly embraces beauty and splendor.
